description: Single storey rear extension, balcony enlargement and demolition of rear bay window/door.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): Site Location Plan Dwg. 10CR/OH/01, Site Plan Dwg. 10CR/OH/02, Existing Ground Floor Plan Dwg. 10CR/PL/01, Existing First Floor Plan Dwg. 10CR/PL/02, Existing Second Floor Plan Dwg. 10CR/PL/03, Existing Roof Plan Dwg. 10CR/PL/04, Existing Front North Elevation Dwg. 10CR/PL/05, Existing Side East Elevation Dwg. 10CR/PL/06, Existing Rear South Elevations Dwg. 10CR/PL/07, Existing Side West Elevation Dwg. 10CR/PL/08, Proposed Ground Floor Plan Dwg. 10CR/PL/P1, Proposed First Floor Plan Dwg. 10CR/PL/P2 rev A, Proposed Second Floor Plan Dwg. 10CR/PL/P3, Proposed Roof Plan Dwg. 10CR/PL/04, Proposed Front North Elevation Dwg. 10CR/PL/P5, Proposed Side East Elevation Dwg. 10CR/PL/P6, Proposed Rear South Elevations Dwg. 10CR/PL/P7 rev B, Proposed Side West Elevation Dwg. 10CR/PL/P8 rev B, Design and Access Statement produced by DML Partnership, Heritage Statement produced by Ergo Technics dated 30/04/2025.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).

| Other than the balconies identified in the approved drawings listed under condition 2, no part of the roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the hereby approved extension.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2025).
